attributes.source: Reward for inviting Shikanoin Heizou to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Shikanoin Heizou, equip this card.
After Shikanoin Heizou equips this card, immediately use Heartstopper Strike once.
The DMG increased by Declension is further increased by 1.
(You must have Shikanoin Heizou in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
